item.title: Boostagram Ball - Episode 14
item.description:
Boostagram Ball Episode 14 for November 11th 2023

Boostagram Ball is a music podcast where we automatically switch to the artists' wallet when playing their songs

Use a modern podcast app from podcastapps.com to support the show and the music:

  • Fountain
  • Podverse
  • Podfans
  • Curiocaster
  • Podfriend
  • Podcast Guru
  • Podcast Addict
  • LNBeats.com
  • More added daily!

If you want to creat your own V4V Music Show Check out:

  • The Split Kit
  • RSSBlue.com
  • Podhome.Fm

Music on Today's Show:

My Favorite Band - Everything
JUSTLOUD - Shrooms
Ollie - Lowkey
Simon James - Out of the Blue
The Doerfels - You Feel Like Home(CityBeach)
Signs and Signals - Ravens
HeyCitizen - The Platform
Simon Hawker - GOOD MAN GOES DOWN
Kurtisdrums - First Saw (Feat. ImKidKid)
The Truth Beyond - Descent
Amber Sweeney - Your Will Be Done (feat. Battle Ground High School Vocal Jazz Choir)
Podhome - Love Unveiled
Aidan Fine - Pulse
Ryan Fonda - Only A Call Away
The Doerfels - Sing For You
Sara Jade - Jacoma
Bryan Duncan - Bryan's Hymn (When I Turn To You)
Spike Yee & Proper - Moving in Sequence w/ Proper
Deez Laughs aka wrapthenews - The King is Dead
Jimmy V - Fool me
Joe Martin Music - The Jetsons
My Favorite Band - Racer Why 2

Onboard your favorite artists, send them to:

  • Podcastindex.org

  • Conshax.app
